mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of Staunton Park Addition Co., adjoining City Park, Staunton, Va / E.B. Zerr, Eng'r. ; Wm. H. Kable, Principle of Staunton Military Academy, Director
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Kable, William H. (William Hartman), 1837-1912
Norris Peters Co.
Staunton Park Addition Co. (Staunton, Va.)
Zerr, E. B.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Situated with north to the lower right.
Map is defective at lower right corner, with part of the text relating to the Norris Peters Co. missing.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Imperfect: torn at many fold lines, with some text missing. "From R.S. Gray" written on verso. From the Papers of the Peyton Family, MSS 5843. Gift of John Peyton.
